entry.value: #library required for the UpSet plot%%00010library(UpSetR)%%00010%%00010#data input as a dataframe%%00010frame <- as.data.frame(knime.in)%%00010%%00010#assignment of variables%%00010number_of_intersections <- knime.flow.in[["upset_numberint"]]%%00010upset_order <- knime.flow.in[["upset_order"]]%%00010upset_nsets <- knime.flow.in[["upset_nsets"]]%%00010upset_nint <- knime.flow.in[["upset_numberint"]]%%00010upset_empint <- knime.flow.in[["upset_empint"]]%%00010%%00010%%00010# NA values are converted to zero%%00010frame1 <- frame%%00010frame1[is.na(frame1)] <- 0%%00010%%00010# whether to display empty intersections or not%%00010if (upset_empint == "off") {%%00010%%00009upset_empint <- NULL%%00010} else {}%%00010%%00010# whether the upset plot is based on the number of intersections or degree of sharing%%00010if (upset_order == "number of intersections") {%%00010%%00009upset_order <- "freq" %%00010} else {%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009if (upset_order == "degree of sharing") {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009upset_order <- "degree" %%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009}%%00010}%%00010%%00010# error notice when the binary matrix contains only zero values%%00010frame1$sum_of_rows <- rowSums(frame1)%%00010%%00010if (sum(frame1$sum_of_rows) == 0) {%%00010%%00009knime.out <- plot(1,lwd=0,axes=F,xlab="",ylab="", main="No graph showed, matrix contains only zero values")%%00010} else {%%00010%%00010# if number of sets = 0, all sets will be considered (ie nsets = ncol), otherwise user-chosen number of sets will be considered%%00010if (upset_nsets == 0) {%%00010%%00009upset_nsets <- ncol(frame1)%%00010}%%00010%%00009%%00010# if the user provides non-zero number of intersections to be shown%%00010if (upset_nint > 0) {%%00010upset(frame1, nsets = upset_nsets, mainbar.y.label = knime.flow.in[["y_axis_label"]], sets.x.label = knime.flow.in[["x_axis_label"]], %%00010empty.intersections = upset_empint, nintersects = upset_nint, order.by = upset_order, main.bar.color = knime.flow.in[["main_bar_color"]], sets.bar.color = knime.flow.in[["set_bar_color"]])%%00010} else {%%00010%%00010# if user does not provide any number (or provides 0), all intersections will be shown%%00010if (upset_nint == 0) {%%00010upset(frame1, nsets = upset_nsets, mainbar.y.label = knime.flow.in[["y_axis_label"]], sets.x.label = knime.flow.in[["x_axis_label"]], %%00010order.by = upset_order, empty.intersections = upset_empint, main.bar.color = knime.flow.in[["main_bar_color"]], sets.bar.color = knime.flow.in[["set_bar_color"]])%%00010}%%00010}%%00010}%%00010%%00010# output%%00010knime.out <- frame

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
